attributes.action: Liam Fitzgerald to be included in the 2012 new years honours list
attributes.additional_details:
If we get enough signatures, we would like Liam Fitzgerald from Swindon in Wiltshire to be included in the 2012 new years honours list.
Liam is lovely and enjoys playing football with friends. He is very popular and is an advocate of British history and culture. He is fond of the Fred Perry designer label.
